strict_requirements.mandatory_openaq_ground_truth: ALL cities must have real measured pollutant data
strict_requirements.mandatory_openmeteo_forecasts: ALL cities must have three distinct forecast benchmarks
strict_requirements.data_sources_only: External APIs + Internal system features only

data_sources.ground_truth_required: OpenAQ Real Measured Data (API authenticated) - MANDATORY
data_sources.fire_data_optional: NASA FIRMS Real Fire Detection Data (API authenticated)
